name: GUIDE
description: GUIDE was developed by Reframe Games Inc., a New Brunswick based studio that seeks to promote child and youth wellness through digital game software.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
